name: Murmur Technologies Inc.
description: Developer of an advertising platform intended to provide mobility-based omnichannel advertising services. The company uses smart backpacks with screens attached to them, advanced artificial intelligence, and big data, enabling businesses to advertise and target people dynamically based on geo-locations, demography, and behavior.
one_liner: Developer of an advertising platform intended to provide mobility-based omnichannel advertising services. The company uses smart backpacks with screens attached to them, advanced artificial intelligence, and big data, enabling businesses to advertise and target people dynamically based on geo-locations, demography, and behavior.
